Megatron x/ Malice:
Megatron fired a volley of stun missiles to confuse wea=
pons tracking and dropped down, training his beam rifle on hydras, firing t=
wice before moving laterally to his right.=A0 He fired his fusion cannon do=
wn toward Scorponok and fired a full power shot, hoping to destabilize the =
ground under him.
~*~
Malice meanwhile came fully online and was quickly to=
 let himself out of captivity.=A0 His flight form helped jam the internal s=
ensors of the base with an energy barrier, keeping the autoguns quiet.=A0 "=
Oh ROdimus, I want to talk to YOU!" he called out, bringing his beam rifle =
to the ready.

<html><head><style type="text/css"><!-- DIV {margin:0px;} --></style></head><body><div style="font-family:times new roman, new york, times, serif;font-size:12pt"><P>Megatron x/ Malice:</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Megatron fired a volley of stun missiles to confuse weapons tracking and dropped down, training his beam rifle on hydras, firing twice before moving laterally to his right.  He fired his fusion cannon down toward Scorponok and fired a full power shot, hoping to destabilize the ground under him.</P>
<P> </P>
<P>~*~</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Malice meanwhile came fully online and was quickly to let himself out of captivity.  His flight form helped jam the internal sensors of the base with an energy barrier, keeping the autoguns quiet.  "Oh ROdimus, I want to talk to YOU!" he called out, bringing his beam rifle to the ready.</P>
<DIV style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman, new york, times, serif"><BR><BR>
<DIV style="PADDING-LEFT: 5px; FONT-SIZE: 12pt; MARGIN: 5px 0px 5px 5px; BORDER-LEFT: #1010ff 2px solid; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman, new york, times, serif">----- Original Message ----<BR>From: xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...><BR>To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com<BR>Sent: Monday, June 2, 2008 2:55:44 PM<BR>Subject: Re: Fw: Evil Revelations<BR><BR>
<DIV id=ygrp-text>

You will reach a sort of one wagon <BR>train,take it and you will exit far away here. then you have to <BR>follow the femme's signature and you will reach teh old maximal base. <BR>Good luck"<BR><BR>OOC: sorry I had trobles withmy internet<BR><BR>--- In <A href="mailto:nbwrpg%40yahoogroups.com" target=_blank rel=nofollow ymailto="mailto:nbwrpg%40yahoogroups.com">nbwrpg@yahoogroups. com</A>, Richard Allen <roborick007@ ...> wrote:<BR>><BR>> ::Jhiaxus/Scorponok ::<BR>> &nbsp;<BR>> Not one to just stand around as someone aims at them, Jhiaxus <BR>leaped up, transforming to jet mode.
